title: The Science of Making Bread
description: Social distancing has some of us taking up bread baking for the first time, including host Maddie Sofia. Chemist and baker Patricia Christie explains the science of making bread, including a few tips for when things go wrong with your bread dough. And she offers some advice for first-time bakers everywhere.

itunes:summary: Chemist Patricia Christie explains the science of making bread, and shares a few tips (and emotional support) for when things go wrong.
